channel.title: Docker Compose :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: Docker Compose The last step we can take to make our application easier to deploy is to create a Docker Compose file that shows how to deploy this application easily within a Docker environment. It is becoming more and more popular for self-hosted projects and web applications to include a sample Docker Compose file to show how the application should be deployed in practice. So, letâ€™s look at a quick example for our application.
